intro: Microstylis hastilabia, commonly known as the slender spike-rush, is a flowering plant belonging to the Cyperaceae family. It is characterized by its narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, clustered inflorescences. The plant typically grows in wet or marshy habitats, thriving in moist soil conditions. It has a compact growth habit and is often found in temperate regions. Microstylis hastilabia plays a role in stabilizing soil and providing habitat for small aquatic organisms.
